footer.text: Keep in mind that we generally partner with anime/manga/light novel-oriented servers. We also will briefly look at your server to see if it's fit for partnership.

description:
If you're a staff member of a server and want to partner with us, you can reach us by use of the ??suggest command.

To use the command, type in any channel `??suggest [Your request for partnership and Discord invite`.

At that point, you're done! A thread will be created for your request to enable discussion. You're welcome to participate! A <@&933085846549200897> majority is needed for approval.

If you get accepted, we will ask for a banner, icon, permanent server invite, and description.
title: __How To Partner With Us:__
